cn.edu.tsinghua.stat.investment

类 Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.tsinghua.stat.investment.Transaction
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Comparable<Transaction>

    public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Transaction>
    Transaction Class is used to record the transaction information
    作者:
    liuqian14-2014011216

      Transaction(TransactionType type, java.lang.String price, java.lang.String quantity, java.time.LocalDate date)

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(TransactionType type,
                   java.lang.String price,
                   java.lang.String quantity,
                   java.time.LocalDate date)
            throws InvalidTransactionException,
                   java.lang.NumberFormatException
        The first constructor of Transaction class(without id).
        参数:
        type - The type of the transaction, including BUY, SELL, BONUS and INC_SHARE.
        price - The price of the transaction
        quantity - The quantity of the transaction
        date - The date when the transaction happens
        抛出:
        InvalidTransactionException - Throw an exception when something invalid happens
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - Throw an exception of BigDecimal when something is wrong

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(int id,
                   TransactionType type,
                   java.lang.String price,
                   java.lang.String quantity,
                   java.time.LocalDate date)
            throws InvalidTransactionException,
                   java.lang.NumberFormatException
        The second constructor of Transaction class (with id).
        参数:
        id - The id of the transaction
        type - The type of the transaction
        price - The price of the transaction
        quantity - The quantity of the transaction
        date - The date when the transaction happens
        抛出:
        InvalidTransactionException - Throw an exception when something invalid happens
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - Throw an exception of BigDecimal when something is wrong

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        concatenate the transaction information into a string
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        The string of the transaction information

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Transaction t)
        compare(and sort) the transaction information by date
        指定者:
        compareTo 在接口中 java.lang.Comparable<Transaction>
        返回:
        return negative value when the date is earlier or positive values when it is later

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws InvalidTransactionException,
                        java.lang.NumberFormatException
        the main function to conduct the unit test
        参数:
        args - the arguments of the main function
        抛出:
        InvalidTransactionException - Throw an exception when something invalid happens
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - Throw an exception of BigDecimal when something is wrong
